body: +1 for this feature.   Can we name the status purpose "refresh" instead of "supersession"? The former might be easier to understand.

refresh would make sense, especially if its paired with a refresh service (optional, could also be out of bound). I had `update` at first then changed to `supersession` to align with the revocation/suspension terminologies.  Whichever term has consensus around which is representative of the features.
